summary: vanessa santillan 's body was found in a # 400,000 flat in fulham , south west london , at the end of march . the 33-year-old mexican national , who worked as a transgender escort , died at the end of march . her body was found in a flat in fulham having been strangled and beaten to death . a 23-year-old man was arrested in connection with her death but has been bailed .

aspect: 1. A man has been arrested in connection to the death of a transgender escort, Vanessa Santillan, who was found strangled and beaten last month. Santillan had worked in London, Paris, and Miami as an escort.
2. A 23-year-old man was arrested in connection with her death, but later bailed. Scotland Yard is appealing for anyone who had contact with Santillan in the hours before her death.
3. Detective Chief Inspector Rebecca Reeves leads the investigation and urges anyone who saw Santillan on Friday or Saturday to come forward.
